Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.12208971]Feline immunodeficiency virus(FIV-Petaluma):inhibition of reverse transcriptase activity in CrFK cells(IC50=1.32 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide may facilitate interference with viral assembly or release and reduce the number of infectious progeny virions.

Literature.Title: Inhibitory activity of synthetic peptide antibiotics on feline immunodeficiency virus infectivity in vitro.
Literature.Author: Ma J, Kennedy-Stoskopf S, Jaynes JM, Thurmond LM, Tompkins WA.
